GMSCR.gmScreen.Title: GM Screen
GMSCR.gmScreen.EmptyCellHint: Drag and Drop a Journal Entry, Rollable Table, Actor, or Item from either the World or a Compendium.
GMSCR.settings.gm-screen-config.Name: Grid Tabs
GMSCR.settings.gm-screen-config.Label: Tabs Config
GMSCR.settings.gm-screen-config.Hint: Add, Remove, and Update Grid Tabs here.
GMSCR.settings.columns.Name: Columns
GMSCR.settings.columns.Hint: How many columns do you want? Changing this may require a grid clear.
GMSCR.settings.rows.Name: Rows
GMSCR.settings.rows.Hint: How many rows do you want? Changing this may require a grid clear.
GMSCR.settings.right-margin.Name: Drawer Only: Right Margin
GMSCR.settings.right-margin.Hint: Sets the offest from the sidebar to the right side of the GM Screen. This number affects the maximum possible width of the screen in drawer display mode.
GMSCR.settings.drawer-height.Name: Drawer Only: Height
GMSCR.settings.drawer-height.Hint: Sets the height of the GM Screen in drawer display mode.
GMSCR.settings.drawer-width.Name: Drawer Only: Width
GMSCR.settings.drawer-width.Hint: Calculated as a percentage of the available screen width after the sidebar and right margin are taken into account.
GMSCR.settings.drawer-opacity.Name: Drawer Only: Opacity
GMSCR.settings.drawer-opacity.Hint: Controls how opaque the drawer is.
GMSCR.settings.condensedButton.Name: Condensed GM Screen Button
GMSCR.settings.reset.Name: Reset
GMSCR.settings.reset.Hint: Clear the Grid entries. This action can not be undone.
GMSCR.settings.display-as-drawer.Name: Display as Drawer
GMSCR.settings.display-as-drawer.Hint: Display the GM Screen as a drawer on the bottom of the screen, as opposed to a normal dialog. If you want to use PopOut, set this to false.
GMSCR.warnings.noGrids: Your GM has not shared any GM Screen Grids.
GMSCR.warnings.clearConfirm.Title: Clear Grid
GMSCR.warnings.clearConfirm.Content: Are you sure you want to clear the grid entries? This action can not be undone.
GMSCR.gridConfig.errors.empty: Cannot save the grid with no tabs.
